description: <Dark Legion> is a VR first person shooter (FPS) and magic game. The player plays a chief officer on a space mission. The spaceship breaks down on the way back to earth, causing a forced landing onto a mysterious planet. In order to return back to earth, the player starts an expedition to search for energy source, only to find a huge conspiracy that a military troop on this planet is making mutant creatures in secret, that will be a catastrophe for human race. To protect your own race and your own planet, load your weapons and go destroy the dark legion!  Huge battle scenes, advanced game level design, and smart AI, making you indulged in the game for a dozen hours (which we wouldn’t suggest you to go for that long, that’s why we have archives).   Features a.Combination of Shooting and Spells The character can release the spells and the enemy also gets similar power. There are also magicla traps In the stages. f. Weapon System You can use Pistols, Machine Guns, Shotguns, Rifles, RPGs, Grenades, TNTs, Bows and Shields. You can feel it as reality when you reload, release the bold, aim and fire. g. AI Smart enemies The enemy is built with high-level AI system. They could dodge, duck and aim at the player. h. The Collection System You could find the treasure in the stages to archive supplies including Health, Weapons and Ammo. You will also need the clues to find the password and open the door to the next area. i. The Real Shooting Practice Get familiar with every weapon you use. Score and locations will be displayed. You could also invite your friend to compete with.

description: Important: Requires a file picker, such as the OneDrive app, to be installed on your Hololens.   Get a glimpse of data visualisation in a post screen world - import CSV/JSON files and interact with them as immersive, 3-dimensional graphs.   Open files saved in the cloud using a file picker, actively find patterns in your data by changing the dimensions to be displayed and get a better understanding by gazing at data objects and receiving additional info.  This app specifically works well with multidimensional data containing both categorical and numerical dimensions.   Note: The app can only display a maximum of 50 groups/bars at a time. Anything above that will not be displayed.   A few things about data formatting: Missing data values should be left empty. The following file formats are accepted: - CSV (up to 5 MB in size): The file needs to use commas as separators. Do not use an index. The first line defines the column names and hence needs to consist of strings. - JSON (up to 8 MB in size): the file needs to be formatted as follows: one key/value pair per data column/dimension containing the column name as the key and an array of data as the value. All dimensions/columns need to have the same length and the values need to be of the same type.  The file you want to open needs to be uploaded into the location that your file picker accesses. When using OneDrive as a file picker, your files need to be saved in your OneDrive folder.  For a detailed user manual including sample files, please visit the website linked below.

description: Esper is a puzzle game set entirely in a single room. As one of a number of ordinary citizens who have recently been endowed with the power to move objects with their minds, you have been enrolled by the government to undertake a series of tests to show that you are in control of your powers. Use your psychic abilities to pick up objects and solve increasingly challenging tests in order to demonstrate that you are definitely not a threat to the fragile fabric of society.  Controllers supported: Xbox gamepad

description: Experience the PGA TOUR like never before on Windows HoloLens!   Amaze yourself and your friends by placing a 3D map of TPC Scottsdale on your coffee table and seeing the course from a birds eye view.   With the TPC Scottsdale experience, you will be able to:   * Show a map of the course in 3D in your living room or any home or office space.   * Zoom in to view details of any hole on the course, with special attention to the Clubhouse and the most exciting hole in golf - #16 at TPC Scottsdale.    * View all of your favorite players by hole and see their shot trails as they battled towards victory during the Waste Management Phoenix Open.   * Compare two players on each hole to see how they performed and the distance they achieved with each shot.   * View heat maps of each hole to see where most ball traffic occurred during the tournament.   * Look at real time weather in Scottsdale, AZ.   The TPC Scottsdale experience is the first holographic golf application designed to enhance your enjoyment of the sport, and to enhance your perspective of a tournament. Download it today.

description: KADO Demo is a limited version of the application aimed to demonstrate architects, engineers, construction teams and facility managers the capabilities of KADO framework and what can AR/MR do for construction industry. The demo was designed as a tool to help MEP engineers to do point layout on site.  KADO Demo is only a showcase of what can be built on top of KADO framework. Every Construction company has unique requirements for AR Software solutions, which is why KADO supports multiple tools that give the companies the flexibility to pick the right building blocks for your next AR tool or product without additional hassle and coding from scratch.  If you are interested in the commercial version or have questions about this application, please email ar@intellectsoft.net.

description: Holo Terrain is a 3D terrain and map visualization tool for HoloLens with *SHARED HOLOGRAPHIC EXPERIENCE*. Experience our beautiful planet like never before. Enjoy the glory of the mountains, hills, deserts, snowy peaks and green valleys.  Holo Terrain gives a bird eye view of our earth rendered as 3 dimensional terrain. There are 4 zoom levels available and the terrain board can be scaled to your liking. Check out our 6 favorite locations or search for a city / locality name of your choice. For shared multi-lens session, please make sure to scan the room thoroughly.

description: Have fun across the full spectrum of mixed reality! This first-of-its-kind app takes advantage of the unique aspects of each device type in the Windows Mixed Reality family. Grab a Microsoft HoloLens, at least one Windows Mixed Reality immersive headset, and some friends to explore and solve challenges together on an island with a few tricks in the sand.  With this app, you can: • Choose your adventure as a HoloLens guide or immersive headset explorer (this multiplayer experience supports up to 3 players in immersive headsets, plus several HoloLens guides). • Experience the full spectrum of mixed reality, from holograms in your real world to full digital immersion. • Learn the power of UWP - a single binary recognizes your device type and delivers a unique experience for each.  This game is the open-source project taught at Mixed Reality Academy sessions during Microsoft Build 2017. You can learn how to create this app and find the source code at aka.ms/mr250.

description: How do you imagine your dream car? Many people picture it as a luxury red sports car with a charismatically roaring powerful engine. Sounds exciting? With Holographic Dream Car application for Hololens you have an opportunity to see the car of your dreams in a holographic mode.  The application supports several functions, such as:  Rotate: enables horizontal rotating of the model. Scale: enables scaling mode to change the size of the model. Sound: turns on the sound of the engine.  Now you have an opportunity to look at this amazing sports car any time you want. Just run the app on your Hololens and see the holographic magic. Oh yes, and don't forget to ask someone to take a photo of you next to a cool car!

description: The Program-Ace's most featured hero - Archy, the Rabbit - is now ready to feel the power of Microsoft HoloLens. He is excited to help children and adults explore the world of holographic computing. Specially designed to showcase all of the mixed reality capacities, the application will be a perfect match for children's natural curiosity and adult's passion for new technologies.   Using this application is a piece of a cake. It is fully responsive to all standard HoloLens gestures and is sensitive to voice commands as well. To help you adapt using it, we have designed a tutorial that will show you how to control and manage the app, what voice command to use, and how to interact with the rabbit. You may enjoy playing with Archy, this fluffy little cutie, without the necessity to be connected to the Internet. All you need to have fun are HoloLens and a good mood!

description: HoloGauge is a measuring tool to help you to measuring the distance and the area. User only need to place some points on something, the system will use a line to connect points and show the distance between point and point. If the last point and the first point are overlapping, it will become a area and the system will show the area size. If the point is placed on the wrong place, user can use "Redo" to remove the last point, or use "Remove" to clear all points. In addition, The main menu could be move to anywhere as you want.  User could change the display unit. HoloGauge is support Centimeter, Meter, Inch and Feet unit.  Voice commands are available in HoloGauge.  - "Redo" is remove the last point. - "Cut" is create a new line. - "Remove" is clear all points. - "Spatial Enable" / "Spatial Disable" is used to show or hide the spatial map. - "Unit Centimeter" is changed the unit to centimeter. - "Unit Meter" is changed the unit to meter. - "Unit Inch" is changed the unit to inch. - "Unit Feet" is changed the unit to feet.  - "Unit Centimeter" is changed the unit to centimeter.

description: This program lets you explore the HyperCube operating in Four Dimensions and visualized in Three with a moving hologram.   The Instant 3D Builder engine with Perfect Word scripting lets you quickly build your own prototypes and share with others.  Please restart the program as needed especially just after first install or update.  Quick Start:  For HyperCube Help ... Say "show hypercube help" Say "add playspace" Say "draw hypercube" Say "bring to me" Experiment with the commands on the hypercube help screen.  For Instant 3D Builder help ...  Say "help" and allow the help screen to build to final beep.  Take some time to look over help. Say "stop rotation" if desired.   And you can say "bigger" or "smaller" as desired. Feel free to move around, or just say "bring to me".  Say "delete playspace".  Say "add playspace" Look away and say "bring to me"  Say "draw hypercube"   Say "help" again and allow the help screen to build to final beep. Look away to a convenient location and say "help" Say "smaller" Say "push left" to regain control of the playspace with the hypercube and store the current playspace.  Say "bring to me" to ensure you have control of the hypercube.  Now do your first script ... a script to draw three hypercubes and join into a single playspace that is easily manipulated.  Say "start script" and wait for the beep after the intro is spoken. Say "three hypercubes" ... the name Say "add playspace" ... adds a new playspace so the result of the script will be a new independent playspace  Say "add playspace" ... this will hold the first hypercube Say "draw hypercube" Say "join playspaces" ... joins to the first playspace  Say "add playspace"  Say "draw hypercube" Say "join playspaces" ... joins to the first playspace  Say "add playspace"  Say "draw hypercube" Say "join playspaces" ... joins to the first playspace  Say "remove axis" ... cleans up the axis added, one per playspace Say "remove axis" Say "remove axis" Say "remove axis"  Say "stop script" .. stops, processes, and makes available your script.  Now your new script is available to use, and will load up next time you start the program. To use it now, ...  Say "three hypercubes"  Look away and say "bring to me"  Say "slow rotate playspace on minus y"  Other hypercube commands are   "draw xy hypercube" "draw xw hypercube" ... and other commands using to letters from 'xyzw'. These are not yet on help.  Also "tesseract".  'Bloom' to suspend the program, or "application exit" to exit entirely.

description: Experience a new kind of immersive horror in Dreadhalls!  You are trapped deep inside a massive dungeon. Explore it, survive it, and find a way to escape. Your only weapons will be stealth, your own courage, and a faint light.  Inspired by the survival horror and roguelike genres, Dreadhalls has been terrorizing people ever since its debut at the 2013 Oculus + Indiecade VR Jam.  Dreadhalls is an intense and scary experience, not for the faint of heart. You have been warned!  (Note: Dreadhalls require a Windows Mixed Reality immersive headset)  MOTION SICKNESS WARNING: This game uses camera locomotion, which can\ncause motion sickness in some people. If you feel uncomfortable, please stop playing. You can adjust its settings from the Options menu.

description: REX is a new type of AR platform for easy sharing of any 3D content. Whether you need an AR product catalog for your web shop, or just want to show your future home to family and friends, REX converts your 3D models into stunning holograms in just a few seconds.  Pick the 3D model (e.g. your home, a bookshelf, or some alien monster) and upload that 3D file to your REX account. That's it!  REX Holographic is the full-featured viewing and presentation app for all your REX models. REX Holographic can be controlled remotely from any phone, tablet or even a web browser. Explore your model by yourself or invite any number of users with their HoloLenses, AR smartphones and tablets to join the session.  Visit www.robotic-eyes.com to learn more.

description: The hottest VR slicer title is here! You play as a front-line warrior in the Three Kingdoms Period of China. With nothing to depend on but your swords and your courage, you must slash your way through vast armies and face off against the most distinguished generals, on your path to fame and glory. Experience the best in VR swordplay and live out the events of the Three Kingdoms.  Game Mechanics 1. A variety of enemies and challenges await you in each level. All paired with dynamic backgrounds and music to bring an immersive three kingdoms experience. 2. Wield the weapons of notable war heroes to dominate the battlefield. A mixture of duel wielding, shields and special abilities combine to give players the best in VR swordplay.  3. Introducing signature bosses, each with their own unique abilities and voice lines. Prepare to face off against the most famous generals and warriors in the history of China. 4. Hone your skills and aim for the top of the global leaderboards. Who will ultimately claim the title of the King of Blades? 5. Share your story with friends and capture the best moments in combat with the in-game selfie feature. Personalize your experience by collecting the masks of fallen generals for added flair. 6. Abilities and weapons are all hidden away in golden eggs scattered across the battlefield. Test your luck, smash one open and see what you'll find.

description: Holo-Machine lets you create your scenic vision using holograms of shapes, scenery, people and lights.  With Holo-Machine creatives from any industry, but mainly theatre and entertainment, can start playing around with shapes, colours and ideas at the beginning of your design journey. You create a complete full scale mock up of your ideas which you can walk around to help you make important design decisions early on in your creative process.  It is a requirement to use this app in conjunction with the companion app. The companion app is called "Holo-Machine Companion App" which can be downloaded on the windows store here: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productId/9P5DBW0Z2CXW  For more information please visit jamessimpson3d.com

description: "Of all the things you choose in life, you don't get to choose what your nightmares are. You don't pick them; they pick you." -- John Irving  This is a horror experience designed to show people just how scary VR can be... The game has been made with a singular focus. Scaring you, scaring your family, and scaring your friends. Plunge yourself into a world of nightmares and fear, and discover just how frightening virtual reality can be.

description: Coming from independent roots, QuiVr has quickly become one of the success stories of the VR community. One of the top selling and most popular multiplayer VR games in 2017, QuiVr puts the incredibly satisfying power of real-world archery mechanics into your hands. Tasked with defending your people against an army of invading monsters, all that stands between life and death is your skill, your allies, and the powerful equipment you'll earn along the way. Supported by one of the most active and engaged online communities in VR, QuiVr offers seamless drop-in co-op play with a large enough community that you'll rarely fight alone if you don't want to. Frequently the #1 or #2 game in nearly every VR arcade where it is offered, QuiVr is the game of choice for both VR veterans and newcomers alike. Discover what thousands of VR fans already have.  Note: Requires Windows Mixed Reality Motion Controllers

description: This is the first 1 minute sneak-peak, an introduction to the Introduction for Ascension, Zero Infinity One's first Sensory Immersive Experience™ (SIX™). Ascension is an Interactive Story-based Holographic Music Trip. Users will be transported from this world into alternate dimensions through space, by Alien Spiritual Beings who show their human guests what their existence is like, and how it interacts with the human physical realm.  The full SIX™ will be released in 2018, as a shared experience in a dedicated Venue(s) (Nightclub/Lounge). It will later be made available for home/personal use.

Please note that you might need a chair to sit on when playing the game. In which case, try not to injure yourself.  Development of this game started as a hobby project to chill, play backgammon. description: Three roller coasters with a Interactive Roller Coaster Three different experiences   -Apocalypse Destruction At this ride you feel inside the apocalypse  The asteroids will destroy everything Even the roller coaster you are in can be destroyed Feel different Sensations   -Apocalypse Shoot the Asteroids Interactive Roller Coaster ride at apocalypse environment  Here you can shoot and destroy the asteroids, with a powerful laser  You can ride and make a new score at each new ride.   -Before Apocalypse Here you can enjoy a slow ride with no loops at a sunny day.  At this experience there is no apocalypse Roller Coaster at Immersive Apocalypse environment  You can ride and feel the Apocalypse environment  This app require windows mixed reality headset  Warning VR app may cause motion sickness

description: ■A FIRST-PERSON ACTION GAME TO BATTLE GIANTS You will be facing ferocious attacks from the giants.With your skills alone, you must come out victorious by defeating all the giants!  ■THE BATTLES DEPEND ON YOUR MOVEMENTS! Move exaggeratedly to avoid attacks from enemies.You can change weapons instantly according to the situation. Pick the best weapon to defeat the monster you are facing!  ■EARNS YOUR POINTS BY "AWESOME ACTIONS" You will get extra points for ''Awesome Actions'' such as avoing attacks at the last moment, or delivering head shot.Don't be a chicken like hiding behind a shield or crouching all the time! Compete with players from all over the world for the top score!  ■KEY TO VICTORY Which weapon will you choose when fighting a giant?Your judgments, boldness, and endurance are the key to victory. Don't be afraid of the powerful attacks of the giant, exterminate the enemies stylishly!

description: Create and visualize your 3D content with others. Open http://vyzn.io/demo/ and follow the instructions to try the FREE demo.  Used daily by Schools, Architects, Engineers, Scientists, Museums, Sports, Auto and more.  Vyzn is a tool for designers to create shared multi-user, interactive experiences without writing a single line of code and cut out months of development.  Upload your FBX file from common 3D modeling software such as 3ds Max. Create multiple scenes, views, and spots. Add augmented content such as text, voice overs, labels, movable objects and more. Move objects and rotate them, set size and scale, and add animation. More on https://vyzn.io/docs/. Contact us at info@zengalt.com or (408) 520-9014 to get access to model uploading or get a consultation.

description: ZOOO is an entertainment application for HoloLens, with which you can summon life size animals wherever you are.  With this app you can summon large life size animals which you don't usually have the chance to see in real life and examine them up close.   If you choose a giraffe, it will appear and its head will go through the ceiling if you are indoors. If you choose an elephant, it will appear. However, due to its immense size, the floor may break under its weight and it will fall through the floor. This app can show you the huge size gap between these big animals and humans by utilizing the unique technology of HoloLens, and it will let you learn about them in a fun way.  In addition to currently living animals, you can also bring back extinct animals such as dinosaurs, which will make your experience in this app even more unprecedented and extraordinary.

description: Lifeliqe is presenting a brand new addition to its range of apps - Lifeliqe HoloLens! Experience the award-winning content in mixed reality and examine the educational 3D models right in your classroom as if they were really there. Now also in Spanish and completely free!   Spark light bulb moments with 40 interactive 3D models and 20 lesson plans from K-12 subjects and topics:   Life Science (Human Biology, Plant Biology, Animal Biology, Paleontology) Earth and Space Science (Astronomy, Geology) Physical Science (Physics, Chemistry) Culture   3D MODELS WITH INTRODUCTION Lifeliqe HoloLens offers 40 interactive 3D models related to STEM K-12 topics to help students master science. All Lifeliqe HoloLens content is verified by the world’s top universities and all models have their own introductory content that explains what you’re seeing. First time using mixed reality? Don't worry, Lifeliqe HoloLens also includes a tutorial!   LESSON PLANS Lifeliqe includes interactive lesson plans enhanced with 3D models, all aligned to NGSS and Common Core, while also correlated with the four most commonly used science textbooks in the U.S.   POWER OF VISUAL LEARNING Did you know that 65% students around the world describe themselves as visual learners? Lifeliqe HoloLens allows everyone to study each model from all angles and distances. Turn the models around, or enlarge them to see every single detail.

description: Why don't you use the latest visualization technology available to enhance your engineering and design data ?   ORINOX is proud to introduce its new Windows Holographic app, Orinox Model Review (OMR) application now available for download. OMR is designed to be connected to our cloud based platform OCWS, for storage and management of Digital Asset. The Digital Asset is the Digital Twin of your physical asset. Our platform capture the Tags and Technical Information (1D/2D/3D) of your asset. After creating a new project you can easily drop on this platform AVEVA rvm or AUTODESK fbx file, directly from your favourite design software.   This solution for Digital asset visualisation is also compliant with BIM, Building Information Modelling or Better Information Management. But also PLM, Plant Lifecycle Management or ALM, Asset LifeCycle Management.

description: Assist an ex-space pirate who crashes into your room against the evil Astral Raiders led by Captain Lugg. Build powerful emplacements to destroy, stun, and defend against the pirates as they send ships and drones to defeat you!  Astral Raiders is an Action, Tower-Defense game in Augmented Reality for the Microsoft Hololens! Developed over nine-months as a capstone project for seniors in Drexel University's Digital Media and Computer Science majors. Additionally five team members assisted us with Audio from Drexel's Audio Post Crew club and a concept artist helped us create this amazing game!  Interested in learning more about this project? Feel free to visit 11thhourgames.com to view our development blog and contact us!

description: #Archery brings out your inner archer in a way you have never seen before! Make pizzas, sell ice cream, deliver newspapers and much more - all with bow&arrow like there is no tomorrow!  Imagine waking up one day and having to do basically everything with a bow and arrow. Crazy right? Well, that is what happened to you and now you need to live your life accordingly. Play your way through your various work days where you sell ice cream to kids, make vegetarian pizzas, deliver newspapers, chop wood, catch fish, destroy someones lawnmower and various other shenanigans. We don’t judge, but we certainly encourage you to destroy EVERYTHING! After all - you’re the master of #Archery in VR. Don’t try this IRL.   After playing this game you can add the following job titles to your CV:  Pizza Baker Paper Deliver Wood Chopper Fisherman  Ice Cream Seller Hot Dog Eater Florist Balloon Smasher Gunslinger Basketball Player Whack-A-Moler Airplane Crasher Fluffy Unicorn Creator  Link to press kit: http://www.vrunicorns.com/archery  VRUnicorns is a bunch of game jammers from Europe. We fancy making quirky semi-realistic room scale VR sports games with a touch of grotesque humor.

description: Visual illusions are a good mean to demonstrate some of the engineering shortcuts in our brain. Almost all of the known visual illusions are evoked by using a two-dimensional (2D) presentation. Take as example the "Freezing Rotation Illusion". Here a physically continuously turning foreground object (e.g. an image of an airplane) is perceived as slowing down (freezing) and speeding up, while its surround (e.g. the image of a greenhouse) is rotating back and forth.  When using a 3-dimensional turning airplane model with different back and forth rotating surroundings, which are the best conditions for the Freezing Rotation Illusion to occur?  Firstly, which is the optimal surround? Wedges in randomly chosen sizes and colors or are combined to build a tubular and/or a disk shaped surround. Another choice is a 360° x 180° panorama of a green-house. Secondly, should the airplane and its surround be in about the same depth plane, i.e. in about the same distance from the observer or not? Thirdly, how much the airplane and its surrounding have to overlap for the illusion still to arise? Can we look from the side and still get the illusion?

description: Snow Fortress is a room-scale Virtual Reality snow fort building & battle game. Relive your childhood by building snow forts as you prepare for epic snowball fights! Unlock tools to protect your fort and deliver a fury of snowballs at your opponents!  Build your snow forts and destroy the snowman's fort in 20 unique levels Throw snowballs or use your slingshot to do some real damage Build and maintain a fort while protecting it against waves of attacking snowmen in Survival Mode Play in online multiplayer Unlock a shield and other tools to protect yourself and your fort Build a miniature snow fortress and defend it by placing your own snowmen on it's walls  Snow Fortress is created from the ground up for room-scale VR and supports all Mixed Reality headsets. It takes full advantage of motion controllers to let you build the perfect snow fort ... and then watch it get trashed by an army of angry snowmen.

description: Agent: your duty is to eliminate a growing threat to mankind. You are the last defense against the inhuman threat. Welcome to being a top secret exterminator. Armed with your super secret laser bug extractor, you're ready to crush public enemy #1: the bugs.  In Exterminate you're set loose to end an infestation of creepy crawlies before it's too late! Use advanced equipment to destroy walls and get the bugs. Remember: you're on a tight time limit, and if you're not fast, the bugs may just take over the world!

description: A four-stroke engine has eight cylinder in V configuration. The cylinders are mounted on the crankcase in two sets of four, with all the pistons moving a common crankshaft. It is also known as a V8 engine.  In this app you will be able to:  - Explore the design of a V8 engine. - Explain each part of a V8 engine. - Describe the four strokes which help in working of the V8 engine.

description: Fancy Skiing is developed by HashVR Technology built with the Unity Engine.The game's structure is based on real skiing that players use the handles just as ski poles to get power and lean left or right to control the direction, which brings players a strong immersion. Furthermore, we add a lot of fancy elements, like leaping grand canyons and hunting deer. While skiing, players try their best to avoid obstacles including dynamic ones to ski as far as they can and speed also plays an import role in your final score. You can sit down to play the game if you feel a bit sick.

Tap the Menu button to display the color palette. Select the color, tap the ball on the right side, you can select the thickness of the line in 5 steps.   Tap the Clear button to erase all lines.   Tap the Undo button to return to the previous state.

description: inVokeR is a one versus one wizard dueling game for VR platforms. Challenge your friends in strategic magic combat, casting spells to turn the tide of battle!  • Cast a combination of offensive and defensive Spells to gain the advantage in battle! • Train your skills in the offline modes:  • Train against an AI in multiple difficulties!  • Perfect your aim and spellcasting in the three Target Break Time Attack modes!  • Challenge yourself and test your skill against challenging Bosses in the Boss Trials! • Four different fantasy battle stages to choose from!  • Prove yourself in the online mode to become the ultimate archmage!   • Play with friends in private matches!  • Fight against random players in public matches!  • Free practice target break mode available while waiting for players.  • Cross-platform play!

description: HoloElements is a whole new way to look at the periodic table. Designed specifically for HoloLens, using gaze and air-tap you can select an element from a 3D periodic table. Then, specific information about that element will be presented including a 3D representation of the molecular structure of the chosen element which you can walk around and inspect in detail. The melting point and boiling point of the element are also presented (if applicable) along with a link which will open more information about the element in Microsoft Edge.  This app was designed and developed by students in the Code Cadets group at Canberra Grammar School in Australia: Jack Carey, Joseph Fergusson, Damian Camilleri, Robin Hodda, and Sam Reading-Thompson.

It is a VR Experience where you need to find clues to solve puzzles and find your way out of the Room. There are some items that can be grabbed and carried around. With some items you can interact (such as switches and numpads).  Please notice: - You will need a Mixed Reality Headset - Motion Controllers are required - A room size of at least 2m x 2m is recommended. - Please make sure that you can reach at least a height of 2.10 meters. - Hint: There are 2 Endings!

description: What would it feel like if Helsinki was the city of Aleppo and you were there? What kind of possibilities does virtual reality offer to journalism?  Aleppo-Helsinki is a pilot project developed together with YLE (Finnish Broadcasting Company) around the possibilities that virtual reality offers for journalism, storytelling and personal experience in the beginning of 2017. In the virtual experience the audience is taken first to a familiar scenery in a normal day Helsinki. After a while the Helsinki scenery changes, now resembling more like the news images of a bombed down and deserted city of Aleppo in Syria.  The experience was developed in co-operation with Teatime Research Ltd., Yle Kioski & Yle Beta.

description: Virtual reality meets the zombie apocalypse! Arizona Sunshine is a first-person shooter built exclusively for VR that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic southwestern America overrun by zombies.   When you hear a flash of a human voice on the radio, your hopes surge - there are survivors out in the blistering heat of the post-apocalyptic Grand Canyon state! Armed with little more than your motion-controlled weapons and the scarce ammo and consumables you find along the way, you need to navigate the hordes of zombies coming for your brain in your desperate search for human contact.  Developed from the ground up for VR, Arizona Sunshine puts you in the midst of a zombie apocalypse. Handle weapons with real-life movements, freely explore a post-apocalyptic world, and put your survival skills to the test in VR - putting the undead back to rest is more thrilling than ever before.  Online Multiplayer functionality is coming soon!

The myOperations portal for example is a add-on for the Microsoft System Center Server Manager and offers a flexible and complete replacement for the SCSM self service portal. Publisher_Info: Publisher Info|||Blocks VR website Blocks VR support|||Blocks VR website|||Blocks VR website|||Blocks VR website@https://sanskritisoftwareneha.azurewebsites.net/||||||Blocks VR support|||Blocks VR support|||Blocks VR support@mailto:bajpaiwork@gmail.com|||
description: Blocks VR is fun filled game with over 20 challenges that will keep your engaged for long time.  Game is very simple, just line up blocks from block marked Start to End. You win if End block falls as result of domino effect created by falling blocks in sequence from Start block. Couldn't get all blocks aligned? No worries, you can always get back to same state by clicking on Replay menu  Game has 2 modes 1. Challenge Mode: In this mode, start and end positions are predefined and you need to find the optimal path 2. Free Play Mode: In this mode, you are free to design any pattern you like and when you are done just topple any block to see Domino fall  Use Settings Menu to following: 1. Game Mode: Challenge Mode, Free Play Mode 2. Blocks Type: Marble, Wood, Plastic 3. Rotation Angel 4. Other Settings: Tips, Background, Reset Levels  Features: > Two Game Modes:  A. Challenge Mode: Over 20 challenges  B. Free Play Mode  > 3 Types of Blocks  A. Marble  B. Wood  C. Plastic  > Change Views: Rotate Right, Rotate Left > Share your creation by capturing the screenshot  > Change Background

description: Added Menu to control house size, Sun position and reset the house position.  ARchitect House Demo Walk through your future home with Mixed Reality  Have you ever visited a home that doesn’t exist yet?  With ARchitect that’s exactly what we propose to do: to visit the inside and outside of a house. Explore your future home. Climb the stairs and visit every room. Open every door, window and garage door. All of this before it has even been built.   Check the Sun light on your future home at every hour of the day, from the point of view of your choice.  Instructions: 1 - Start by placing the house on the ground by clicking on it or saying "Place house". 2 - Choose house dimensions:  - Say "Bigger" or "Expand" to enlarge the house   - Say "Smaller" or "Decrease" to shrink the house  - Say "Real Size" to enlarge the house until it is real size  - Say "Doll Size" to make the house the size of a doll house  - Say "Tiny" to shrink to minimum size 3 - The pointer turns red when an action is available. Click it to open and close doors, windows, garage doors, closets and turn light switches ON and OFF. (Lights ON make the rendering performance really slow - always turn them OFF afterwards) 4 - Choose the time of day  - Say "Dawn"  - Say "Sunrise"  - Say "Morning"  - Say "Midday"  - Say "Afternoon"  - Say "Sunset"  - Say "Dusk"  - Say "Night" 5 - To reset the world and reposition the house say "Reset house"

description: The future of measurement is here. MultiMeasure takes accurate, hands-free measurements of the real world (including people). The process is simple. First, generate a holographic mesh by scanning an object. Second, add points to specify measurements. Points can be manipulated using gaze, gestures, and voice commands. Easily add multiple measurements and calculate unit conversions right in the app.  MultiMeasure is a free application designed and developed by Mondo Robot, a digital agency leading exploration into mixed and virtual reality. A full library of features and voice commands are provided in the release notes.

description: Taqtile HoloMaps is the first app of its kind for navigating through a holographic model while simultaneously overlaying real-time data in either a solo or shared experience.  HoloMaps displays topography, infrastructure, and buildings in 3D while integrating data sources to bring contextually relevant information into the map. Collaborate and present to colleagues in the same room or remotely.  The HoloMaps Store Edition integrates Bing 3D to delivery over 200 cities and landmarks as a 3D model of any size.   This version is a solo experience and features current weather & forecast, traffic flow lines & incidents, and geo-tagged Tweets. Add text notes and 3D ink annotations during sessions and save for later viewing.   Capture mixed-reality pictures and videos for presentations, itineraries, and to share with friends, family, and colleagues.   Visualize the World like never before with Taqtile HoloMaps.    This version is a solo experience and features:  Current weather & forecast Traffic flow lines & incidents Geo-tagged Tweets Text notes 3D ink annotations  View these iconic locations and more in hi-res 3D:  Empire State Building, Central Park, The Financial District California, Niagara Falls, The Space Needle, La Sagrada Familia Barcelona, The Colosseum, The Magic Kingdom Disney World, Fenway Park, Copenhagen Denmark

description: Full-size 3D keyboard utility made for Microsoft HoloLens app developers, for D3D build, enabling in-App username / password / url entries. Demos video: v1.2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=83_oR3Oy4CA  New features added in v1.2, thanks to your feature requests:  1. Scale up/down voice commands  2. Leave / remove note voice commands  3. Visual feedback for tapping any key  4. Special key symbols replacing "shf", "spc", "bs", and "rt"  5. Re-arranged high-usage keys to optimize user experience  Hand-crafted keyboard includes: uppercase, lowercase, digits, and most symbols available on standard English keyboards. Special keys: "⇧": Shift; "␣": Space; "⇦": Backspace; "⏎": Return, starting on a new line. Non-special keys can be easily customized in Unity without coding.   Built-in with Show/Hide (green) button and Move/Pin voice commands for HoloLens.  This App starts with a test scene for demonstration purposes using Gaze, Gesture, and Voice with this keyboard utility on HoloLens.  Instructions:   Typing:  Look at a key steadily such that the circular “Gaze” cursor is on the key, and perform an air tap “Select” gesture. There should be a typing sound and visual cue as feedback.  Voice commands:  1. “Move keyboard”: Keyboard will be placed at a distance of 1.5 metre in front of you, while facing you and following your movement.  2. “Pin keyboard”: Keyboard will stop moving and stay where it was in space. 3. “Scale up keyboard”: Keyboard will scale up by 10% (i.e. new scale = old scale * 1.1) 4. “Scale down keyboard”: Keyboard will scale down by 9.09% (i.e: new scale = old scale/1.1) 5. “Leave note”: A copy of current text will be created and left in the holographic space. 6. “Remove note” while gazing at the top row of a previously left note: The note will be removed.  Special keys:   “⇧” (formerly “shf”): Shift between lowercase and uppercase keyboard displays and inputs;  “␣” (formerly “spc”): Space;  “⇦” (formerly “bs”): Backspace;  “⏎” (formerly “rt”): Return, starting on a new line;  “done” green button: Shows / Hides the keyboard.

description: ANIMA RES, a highly specialised production company for medical visualisation, has committed itself to awaken our fascination for the human body.  INSIGHT HEART is the first app from a planned series for the medical education of the future. Within INSIGHT HEART a virtual companion called „ANI“ guides you through the functions of the application. Incredibly impressive visuals of myocardial infarction, arterial hypertension and atrial fibrillation enrich the experience and take medical education to the next level.  You are able to control the heart by gesture or voice control. Move, rotate and scale the high-resolution heart hologram floating right in front of you. Experience the heartbeat in real time in a fascinating and immersive way.  View the heart from the inside in the new 2.0 version or learn about the different regions in the new annotations view. The new freeze and unfreeze function lets you examine the heart from every angle with no further distractions.  INSIGHT HEART makes medical education fun again! Enjoy! :)

description: Delve into a photograph and see depth and perspective with a sharp clarity which makes you feel present in the scene, whether it’s a snap of life in the nineteenth century or a high flying skateboarder from the twenty first. New and old technology work together in this app, letting you enjoy stereoscopic images in a new light. Merging the charm and 3D vision of the traditional stereoscope with the power of the HoloLens, this app will allow you to experience a library of stereoscopic images as well as import and edit new additions, opening the world to your view.

description: Meet the man who travelled to California in 1849 for the Gold Rush, who was to become one of San Francisco's most beloved characters. Joshua Norton proclaimed himself "Norton I, Emperor of the United States", in the Evening Bulletin newspaper on September 17, 1859.   He was a famous fixture in the town, one who had his ear to the ground on the social and political issues of the day. A good number of the Emperor's thoughts were published as proclamations in the newspapers and amongst these, the pursuit of connecting San Francisco and Oakland by bridge.   Long after the death of Emperor Norton and more than 60 years later, construction began on the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge and it opened to traffic in 1936. Fast-forward to today, and there is a magnificent art installation on that same bridge.   You will hear some of his story over five vignettes, the last one giving you the opportunity to play on (and with) The Emperor Norton Bridge.  This app contains life-size holograms and is best used in a large open room with lots of light.

description: Play Tower Blocks multiplayer! Use HoloLens' hand gestures to grab blocks from the stack and then balance them on top. It's fun together with your friends or solo!   The player picks up a block with one hand and can move it. At the same time, the player is able to use his/her second hand to rotate the block in a natural way.  An introductory tutorial will guide the user through the interactions once the experience is launched for the first time. The tutorial can also be opened again at any time by saying "Show Tutorial".  This holographic game experiments with hand interactions allows to use a second hand to create an intuitive way to interact with holograms.   In order to play a session of Tower Blocks multiplayer, the hosting user selects Mulitplayer > Start. The other players just select Mulitplayer > Join. The peer-to-peer connection will be established automatically if the participating HoloLens devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi network and the network allows broadcasts. If the auto connect fails, the app will allow to enter the IP address of the hosting player which will be shown in the view of the hosting player.   Tower Blocks is in beta and improvements will follow.

description: Holo Pool Hall is a simple pool table simulator for Hololens. Because Hololens is, with one unit, a very single user experience, this game is best enjoyed as a single player endeavor.  The game primarily uses voice commands for control. It is always assumed you want to hit the cue ball, so the line from your head to the cue ball is the direction you will shoot, and to execute a shot, you simply say "Shoot". You can also adjust your shot strength by saying before shooting: "Quarter Power", "Half Power", or "Full Power". Note that whatever power you set the simulation to, it will remain at that power until you set it to something else.  To rack 'em up fresh, just say "Reset World" at any time.  Saying "Move Table" enters table moving mode, and "Drop Table" to use the new position and continue your game. You can also adjust the rotation of the pool table if you find it is in an inconvenient orientation. The following voice commands facilitate that:  "Rotate Table Clockwise" "Rotate Table Counter Clockwise"  When you launch the game, the pool table will appear to be centered two meters straight ahead of you, and half a meter below your head.  More features are coming soon, as the experience is still in active development, so feel free to give suggestions, and stay tuned for updates.

Publisher_Info: Publisher Info|||Loci AR Mind Map website Loci AR Mind Map support|||Loci AR Mind Map website|||Loci AR Mind Map website|||Loci AR Mind Map website@http://iform.us/||||||Loci AR Mind Map support|||Loci AR Mind Map support|||Loci AR Mind Map support@mailto:support@iform.us|||
description: What - Use Loci to Link In Your Mind. See https://iform.us. Loci is a method of loci mixed reality mind mapping application located around you. It combines the method of loci memory technique and 3D mixed reality interaction with mind maps (graphs) to support you on your personal analysis tasks. These tasks can include looking for an apartment, finding out more about a disease, or deciding on a next job. Loci features initial import capability for MindManager, Freemind, and GraphML files.   Why - Loci uses three core concepts to help you organize, understand and recall; mind maps lets you break a problem down into component parts to organize and do analysis, mixed reality interaction with mind maps lets you visualize in 3D to understand how they are related, and the method of loci persistent placement of mind map nodes lets you improve your recall of the mind map, even when you are not using the Loci software. In this way you can organize your problem, understand it, and remember it later when you need to use that information for decisions.  How - Loci is built for Windows Mixed Reality. Loci supports spatial mapping so you can place nodes from your mind maps in relevant locations in your memory palace. Loci uses voice, gaze and gestures to enable you to make your 3D graphs (mind maps). You start by saying "add node" to make a node representing the problem you are working on, then you look at this node and again say "add node" to add more nodes for attributes of the problem, so you have a visualization of your problem. You can say "capture image" to add nodes with images using the camera, or say "load image" add nodes with images from files. You can link nodes together to show how they are related to each other. To load and save mind maps you use File Explorer or OneDrive. To help you understand how Loci works, it has a seven day free trial.  Where - Where you place and do things is very important to your memory. Locations in your memory palace are important to you. They have meaning that you effectively recall, and with Loci you can combine your visual and spatial memory.  When - Loci helps you on longer term problems you are working on, where you need to apply your capabilities for cognition. You may return to these problems over a span of weeks or months to arrive at the right decision. You use Loci when you have set aside time to do deep analysis at home or work.  Who - If you are solving complex problems, produce complex things, or purchasing complex items or services, such as cars, houses, college, stocks, or medical treatment, you could benefit by organizing, understanding, and recalling your information using Loci.

The Red Pill connects your HoloLens to the Matrix, and lets you see the code that makes up the walls, tables and other objects you believe are real. Be careful though, the agents are close! description: **Requires Microsoft Band to play  This mini-golf game was created as to explore the integration of the Microsoft Band as an controller for the HoloLens.   To play the game, first pair your Microsoft Band to the HoloLens. To pair the band, first turn on pairing on the Band. On the Start menu in HoloLens, go to Settings > Bluetooth. Your Band should appear as one of the connectable Bluetooth devices. Follow the prompts on the Band and HoloLens screen. If successful, the Band will appear as "Connected" on the HoloLens' list of Bluetooth devices.  The first time you open the application, a prompt should appear onscreen, asking you if you'd like to allow the application to access the Band. Select "Yes" and you should be good to go! To play the game, simply swing your arm while wearing the Band to hit the ball. If you hit the ball, you should feel a vibration coming from the Band. The projection of the ball (essentially the direction that the ball will travel in) is shown through a red line coming from the golf ball. If the ball is stuck in a corner or you would like to reset the ball, simply focus your Gaze on the ball and perform the Pinch gesture.

description: *** Find videos and examples from the Medium post 'Designing Typography Insight for HoloLens' ***  Types are beautiful on HoloLens. Typography Insight for HoloLens encourages you to experience, layout and play with types in mixed reality space. It will help you understand the characteristics of the types in HoloLens. ● Type Playground: Compose typographic layout in 3D space with different font, size and colors. You can use it for designing big signage on the wall or constructing experimental typographic structure in space ● Type Size Reference: Observe different type sizes in space ● Typeface Anatomy: Learn about basic terminologies and the detail elements of typefaces ● Historical typefaces: Explore historically important typefaces in 3D timeline view  Originally published to iOS in 2011, Typography Insight has been loved by design and education community. On June 2016, it has been published to Windows Store using Windows Bridge for iOS technology. ● Fast Company "Typography Insight Is Type Design 101, For Just $1.99"(06/22/11) ● The Atlantic "Typography Insight Teaches Fonts Like Never Before"(06/07/11) ● Gizmodo "Typography Insight Makes Learning Fonts Gorgeous and Easy"(05/23/11) ● Presented at AIGA/NY Fresh Blood 2(06/07/11) ● No.2 Paid iPad App in Education Category ● New & Noteworthy, Staff Favorite in 85 countries

description: !!! IN BETA !!!  Description: You are the last resort to keep your galaxy safe from waves of incoming evil mechanical machines summoned by your galactic neighbor.  Beta Details: This is a gameplay example for defending one of the many planets within your galaxy. Currently there is only one enemy type and you are locked to the first level of each tower type. The currency system for defeating enemies and building towers is disabled so you can play with building all the different tower types in different configurations.  Once you have completed the level successfully or the planet has been overrun by your foes the level will reload.  Testing the Beta: Since there is no placing mechanism implemented currently you will want to find an empty 8x8 foot space. Then you will want to stand about 4 feet away from the center of that space and look towards the center of the space and launch the application. This will give you room to move around the planet.  Gaze at the planet and tap/drag to rotate the planet. Hand movement work like a joystick. The closer to the edge you are the faster the planet will rotate.  Gaze at a tower platform and tap to open the menu to build towers.  To start the wave of enemies (after you have built a few towers) tap to select the blue glowing shield on the planet and the round will start.

description: Experience a new era of Mixed Reality Aided Engineering! Mixed Reality provides a modern, natural and effective way of understanding complex 3D structures and devices.   With HoloEngine, you can see an engine floating in the air. You can start the engine, change its speed and even peek inside to see how the pistons work. The app allows you to move, rotate and even resize the engine in your environment, but you can also use your own feet to examine it from every direction. Use gestures or voice commands to control the engine.  Don't forget to try the "About the Team" feature, and get to know the 360world Team - at least our holographic representations!

description: Learn Gaze and Gestures while experiencing Spatial Mapping and Spatial Sound. Ball Pit is a fun and easy way to learn about the HoloLens.  Ball Pit is a simple physics simulation of plastic balls that interact with your environment. Use Gaze and Air tap to move the source of the balls wherever you like. While holding the Ready Gesture you can push the balls around with your cursor, or you can just walk in to the pile.  Ball Pit is a great introduction to HoloLens for non-technical users or as a quick demonstration. The game is intentionally simple to make it easy to explain to a first time user without seeing what they see. No menu navigation or room mapping required.   Have fun!

description: Holographic Academy course Holograms 210, 211, 212. Use your gaze to navigate the cursor on holograms. Find your holograms using the directional indicator around the cursor off holograms. Highlight different astronaut components using your gaze. Gaze at the center chest component and perform the air tap gesture and observe the tag along object.   Rotate the astronaut using your gestures. Say "Move Astronaut" voice command and move the astronaut to where it matters to you!  Gaze at the astronaut's wrist panel and say "Open Communicator". Record a message using voice dictation and then play it back. When ready send that message to the astronaut.  Source code available at: Holograms 210 Gaze: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/holographic/holograms_210 Holograms 211 Gestures: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/holographic/holograms_211 Holograms 212 Voice: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/holographic/holograms_212

description: Holographic Academy course Holograms 101D Introduction to Device.  Use your gaze to position the cursor. Use the air tap gesture to gaze at the origami sphere and drop them. Gaze at the sphere and say "Drop Sphere" or "Select" to do the same action as air tap. Observe how they roll onto every surface using Spatial Mapping. Gaze anywhere and say "Reset World" to reset the spheres. Gaze at the notepad, perform the air tap and now you can place the holograms where they matter to you!

description: Welcome to the Dokodemo Teleportation Door! This is the same teleportation door used by Doraemon. Simply place the door anywhere around you, open the door and walk through to a magic land in another universe. Enjoy!  Tips: Say "place door" to move or place the door. Say "open door" and "close door" or perform a tap gesture on the door to open or close it. Make sure you're in an open space to fully explore the new world!

description: ARails is an augmented reality game to build tracks and simulate vehicle motion within the current physical environment. By adding and adjusting individual track pieces, users can build tracks for trains and roller coasters, roads for cars, and even invisible paths for flying vehicles.  ARails was developed by Jenny Kang, Sonja Khan, Riley Porter, and Nicholas Reiter for the Spring 2016 AR/VR Capstone course at the University of Washington.  Special thanks to the course staff for their help throughout the quarter. Thanks also to Microsoft and the HoloLens team for the opportunity to work with the devices, as well as the resources and help.  To submit feedback, or for any questions, you can reach us at arailsapp@outlook.com.

description: Visual Translator allows you to translate textual information in your field of view from and to a variety of languages (see release notes for full list of supported languages). By looking straight into a billboard, sign, food menu, magazine or any other media with text written on it, and air tapping a couple of times, you are able to see a translated version of the words right on your screen! Visual Translator is specially useful during travels to foreign countries where you don't read the local language.  How to use Visual Translator:  For best results, position yourself straight in front of the billboard, sign, magazine, or text canvas that you wish to translate and align the text to the two horizontal lines so that the words are between them. Make sure the size of the letters are about as big as the space between the lines. After you have aligned the text to the two lines, air tap once to begin translation.   Translation quality decreases dramatically if you don't follow these instructions. For more information on how to obtain best translation results visit www.refractiontech.com.

description: The latest game from Appetizer Mobile is here!  Ghost Invasion is an exciting first person shooter game where you battle ghosts as they shoot fireballs and explode near you! Defeat ghosts, collect points, and buy new weapons.  Start the game by picking your weapon and then selecting the difficulty level from the menu. Then, enter the game and watch for portals that can spawn anywhere around you. To use your weapon, perform an ‘air tap’ gesture with your hand.  Ghost Invasion uses the incredible technology of the Microsoft Hololens to make a 3D map of your room and intelligently spawn portals onto your walls, doors, tables, ceiling, and more! Ghosts bounce off of walls, and the slime splashes when it hits a surface. The gesture controls are very simple to learn, and the ability to walk around your room or house while playing makes each and every person have a unique ghost hunting experience.  Please visit us at www.AppetizerMobile.com for more great games and info!    Music : http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

description: Jump through a portal and enter a time warp to 65 million years ago when giant creatures ruled the earth. In this chapter of our dinosaur story you will see Titanosaurus, the largest dinosaur that ever lived, with a surprise visit from another creature of the Mesozoic Era.  If you are a Museum, School or other institution looking to increase engagement, enhance your exhibits and constantly bring fresh content to your visitors and students, then we should talk. We build experiences for HoloLens. Our proprietary development process allows us to create immersive stories, quickly and affordably, saving you tons of time and thousands of dollars on development costs that you would get from a typical bespoke content creator. Contact us today and find out how to get an experience up in your institution.  http://zengalt.com/ Zengalt, Inc. Bellevue, WA USA info@zengalt.com

description: The 480nm HoloViewer app is a general purpose viewer for 3D objects and scenes. The viewer supports multiple of the most popular exchange file formats: FBX, JT, OBJ, DAE, ZAE, and STL. OBJ is useful for simple static geometry, FBX can be used to exchange complete scenes, and JT is the CAD industry standard for data sharing across the product life-cycle. DAE and ZAE are formats used by COLLADA. The 480nm HoloViewer app is free and ad free.

description: Try HoloFlight and use HoloLens’ groundbreaking technology to visualize real flight data in 3D as holograms.   The user can walk around and explore various parts of the visualized flight space. Simply gaze at airplanes to see detailed flight information or even hear ATC conversations with spatial sound. Different zoom levels of the terrain allow the user to see a broader view but also detailed information for a specific airport, including the control tower’s point of view.  An introductory tutorial will guide the user through the interactions once the experience is launched. The tutorial can also be opened again at any time by saying "Show Tutorial". You can also watch a video : https://vimeo.com/202999079  This is a demo version of HoloFlight using offline data. You can choose between Hawai'i and the French Riviera flight space region. HoloFlight is in beta and improvements will follow.

description: Holocule is a DirectX Hololens app that dynamically renders molecules. It is integrated with 3rd party services to dynamically load molecules from the Internet. Holocule supports manipulation of molecules including zoom and rotate. When you load a molecule, first place the molecule in the right location (such as on a table) then begin your interactions. You can also change how the molecule is rendered. Use voice commands to invoke interactions.

description: HoloRail is a game for HoloLens that lets you build a simple railroad in your living room. You can use a builder to add different kind of rails, including turns, bridges and tunnels. You can rotate and position your scene according to your liking and then pick one of the two train types and watch and hear it roll on your new tracks. Game allows you to save you scene for later play without having to build it from scratch. Please rate our application. Enjoy exploring Microsoft HoloLens. Voice commands you can use are the following: Menu – shows or hides a menu in a game scene  Move – switching state into movement on main track  Reset – train returns to the beginning of the track  Play – starts the train, but only if track ends with a finish rail piece (FINISH) Undo – deletes the last built rail piece Rail – adds a straight rail piece  Bend – builds a regular bend rail piece  Bend Tiny – builds a tiny rail piece  Bend Small – builds a small rail piece  Bridge – builds a bridge rail piece  Finish – builds a finish end rail piece  Stop – stops a moving train  Continue – resumes train movement Change – changes a train type deployed on the rail  Clear – delete all built rail pieces, except for the start position (clean table) Builder – shows or hides a builder menu used for building of rails Load – shows a menu for loading a game from a saved position  Save – shows a menu for saving a game position  Exit – exits to the start menu

description: Improve memory and concentration while having fun! BATTLEBRAIN is the perfect game to help improve brain power. FEATURES: * Fun colorful graphics and animation * Unlimited hours of gameplay * Completely random shuffles, never play the same game twice * Play single player mode with saved high scoring * Play against the computer in BRAIN BATTLE mode * Easy pick up and play with clear on-screen instructions * Improves memory and concentration Great for all ages. * Unlockable bonus card decks and environments

description: For most of us, the scenario is all too familiar: You’re in the comfort of your home, when suddenly hot molten rock begins to flow through the living room. In this situation, what else can one do besides climb between safe points and collect floating ice cream treats?  Thankfully, the geniuses over at HoloFriends have created your one-stop training simulator to prepare you for just such an emergency. So, strap on your favorite HoloLens headset and let Mr. Diki guide you through some action-packed, ice-cream eating, lava-avoiding mayhem.

description: HoloStudy is a series of geology, physics, chemistry and biology lessons. The lessons are designed specifically to give you all the possibilities of HoloLens during educational process. Set off on an incredible journey with virtual professors, dive into complexity of science and grasp the limits of impossible! We promise with HoloStudy you will never look at the world the same way again.  This is a alfa-version of HoloStudy designed to demonstrate the capabilities of our application. This version contains only Geology demo, but during September we are going to release demo for Physics, Chemistry and Biology. During 2016 we are going to launch our first full version of our program.  We are very inspired by opportunities which are provided by Hololens technology for education. We invite the educational institutions for cooperation with us, please visit our website www.holo.study.   If you have any comments and suggestions for improving our app, please contact us via mail or social media, we are happy to take into account the valuable feedback for future releases.

description: Holo Measure allows the user to set points with an air-tap to measure dimensions, areas and volumes. "Dimension" will place two points and close to the second point, it will indicate the exact dimension. "Area" works the same way, you can put a polygon of four points to calculate an area. "Volume" can be calculated by placing a polygon of four point and the fifth point is the height.  Voice command can also be used, by calling out the command to enable or disable. Other options: Is by clicking on the dimension text, which will change and set the units to imperial or metrics. "Drop all" will drop all the point, "Clear all" will delete all points also the dropped ones, "Map" will enable or disable the Spatial Mesh.  TIP: ✓ If you need more precision, go near the location and place your point. ✓ Also for more precision you can use the clicker instead of an air-tap. ✓ Quickly take a picture, call out to Cortana: "Hey Cortana Take a picture".  Keep posted, a lot of new features are planned for the next versions!

description: Have you ever wanted to explore the features and capabilities of a product before it’s available in stores?  We created HoloTire to demonstrate how new products such as an automobile tire, can be presented virtually as 3D holograms, for marketing and training purposes. The user sees the tire integrated into their real world environment at 1:1 (actual) scale. The demonstration allows users to explore key features and technology of the tire using animated visualizations, simple voice commands, and natural hand gestures.  • Touching the holographic tire with your own hand will stop the tire from spinning. • Users can say "reset demo" to start over from the beginning.  • "Face me" will automatically orient the tire towards the user. • Other available voice commands are shown in context of the current scene.

description: Valorem Reply’s innovative 3D telepresence technology, HoloBeam, is breaking down geographic barriers to teamwork and communication and leading the way in remote, volumetric telepresence and collaboration. This ground-breaking technology allows HoloLens users to communicate in real-time with holographic likenesses of colleagues from anywhere in the world. Using 3D depth, motion and full color volumetric video, Valorem Reply’s HoloBeam app streams point cloud data across the Internet using a customized WebRTC stream and normal internet connection (5Mbit/sec). The holographic stream is then decoded and rendered via Microsoft HoloLens, to show a holographic representation of the sender.    HoloBeam is in early access alpha state with pilot deployment opportunities for interested clients. However, the technology currently enables: real-time or on-demand options and full functionality with normal internet connections and within strict firewalls over secure channels.  Ongoing developments include new collaboration tools that allow team members to have shared interactions with 3D applications in the HoloBeam collaboration space.   Please enjoy this tech demo app which demonstrates the HoloBeam technology and allows you to experience the functionality with your own eyes using pre-recorded data. To view the voice commands supported by the demo app, say "show help".

A militaristic swarm of interstellar robots sweeps across the galaxy, silencing countless worlds along the way. Now they've come to Earth, and they're hitting us where we feel safest—our homes.   As these robot invaders break through your walls, move to avoid enemy fire and blast your foes using your gaze, gesture, and voice. Can you survive the attack?

description: Panoptica Lite is a demo version of our full application, Panoptica - AR Collaboration Suite. Panoptica is an Augmented Realty (AR) application that loads 3D models from your desktop and renders them in AR. While using the app, the model can be displayed to scale allowing for the user to interact with and manipulate the model in real-time. These interactions speed up design review conversations and make collaborations about operations, ergonomics, safety, and maintenance in a manner that is simpler, more effective, and much more cost efficient than today's current methods.  Panoptica Lite features include:  -View the models in their actual size or scale them up/down -Place and rotate models -Measure distances between elements of models -Access pop-up tooltips with information about various components in models  Our full version also offers the ability to:  -Load models to the Microsoft Hololens and other supported AR devices from a desktop application -Interact with the models and collaborate with multiple people in the same virtual space at the same time, regardless of whether they’re in the same room or not -Avatar Projections - Have avatars represent remote users and highlight what they are looking at for easy collaboration -Compare as-built to plan by overlaying optically scanned versions of constructed objects on top of the planned 3D models

description: Gravity Lab is a physics & electronics puzzle game with 22 levels and over 60 unique puzzles.  Build your incredible machine with gravity bending appliances from Gravity Lab! Our new lunar testing facility welcomes you to try out our standardised testing scenarios - now designed for humans!  No matter how fast or how heavy your objects are, Gravity Lab can move them! Save money and time by replacing your entire human workforce with automated appliances from Gravity Lab.  Currently awaiting regulatory approval, we invite you to visit our testing facility and give them a go! We have prepared a selection of test scenarios for you and we are certain you can solve them! Also, feel free to create your own test scenario and share them with fellow participants!   Please be aware that strong gravitational forces can cause severe brain damage! Never look directly at the emitted particles! While we tried our best to avoid the creation of micro wormholes, please never try to stack gravitational objects. All damages to the time and space continuum and involved repair cost will be passed on to you!   -- Gravity Lab Management

This service is a valuable tool used by Architects, Construction and Engineering to view and interact with 3D representations of their designs. This Holo-PreCon demo provides an actual example of how the Suffolk Construction Company used the service to produce a vivid, interactive 3D model of one of their structural building designs, for their client. To learn more about the Holo-PreCon service, visit www.SphereGen.com/HoloPreCon

description: Classic strategy gameplay reimagined for VR, from the creators of Arizona Sunshine. Skyworld is an award-winning VR game that combines accessible turn-based strategy and addictive real-time battles, all set in intricately animated miniature worlds. Build and command your forces right on the battlefield, conquer all Skyworlds and compete in online multiplayer. Plus, DRAGONS!

description: Holo CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics) This project is an engineering Trilogy, for the MS HoloLens, comprised of 3 CFD Projects showing numerical analysis and algorithms solving and analyzing problems that involve fluid flows pertaining to 3 digital models.  1.) Ferrari F399 - Marlboro Indy Car 2.) BMW Z3 - Roadster Convertible 3.) Technical University of Munich - Department Level  Created by: Marco Losurdo - Engineer of Germany Paul Kueber - TerraSame CEO USA  For additional information, please visit TerraSame.com

description: WWebView(Windows WebView) : Unity3D Assetstore Example  WWebView is an easy solution for integrating WebView to your windows games. You can set up a web view and embed web content in your game with less than 10 lines of code. There is also a clean and simple interface for you to interact between the game and webview. Above all, WWebView is designed to be very easy to integrate into UniWebView2 and UniWebView3.   https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#!/content/97395

description: droppar.io is the new way to easily send 3D models directly and fast from your PC to your mobile devices. You can then preview them instantly in your real world. Merge your physical models with the amazing world of augmented reality! Because virtual teleportation matters for your business! And the best: it’s for free!  Use it to:  - Preview your 3D models in a real world - Preview your 3D models before printing them - Easily collaborate with your colleagues  - Take AR photos with your interacting models - Send 3D files to your customers for a quick review - … and much more.  Perfect for: - collaborative building & architecture (BIM) - emotional sales & marketing - efficient prototyping - effective product placement  Features: - Scale, rotate, move - Exact positioning - No login required  Supported formats: - .obj - .stl - structure.io zip file (.obj with material and texture)  This is the first release of droppar.io. If you have any feedback you're welcome to contact us at info@droppar.io. Please let us know what we can do to make it better for you!

description: Relax and enjoy immersive Virtual Reality classic puzzle game. Move and rotate the bricks as they fall, attempting to fit them together. When you completely fill one horizontal line with colored bricks, that line disappears and all bricks above move down. If the bricks land on top of the game field, the game is over.  To move, rotate and drop bricks use Motion Controller, Keyboard or Xbox One controller.  Please ensure that you have Windows Mixed Reality headset to play this game.

description: Theorem Solutions Visualization Experience - Free Trial  Theorem Solutions Visualization Experience shows how you can visualize, prepare and present your CAD data for visualization in HoloLens.  Taking direct input from all major CAD systems, Theorem's Visualization Experience prepares and optimizes the data for use in a Mixed Reality Environment and allows the user to navigate and interrogate the data using HoloLens gestures and voice controls.  The In-App tutorial will show you how to make best use of the Experience, including how to load and manipulate CAD data, explode the assembly structure and interrogate individual assembly components.  By downloading and registering to use the Visualization Experience, you will be provided with a free 90 day trial providing access to data hosted on Theorem's web based Experience Server.
